name: Play of Shadows
description:
Take control of your shadow and find your way out of a mysterious dungeon! Interact with the environment to find new paths and reach the next door.

Try the first levels of Play of Shadows and let we know what do you think of this showcase of the core mechanics of the game.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Grab / release objects

Space - Jump

Shift - Project shadow on the wall

Shift + E - Get in / out of the shadow world
